title: Phi Delta Theta Scholarship -  Arts & Sciences
description: To support outstanding A&S student scholarships at CU Boulder.  Once the $25,000 minimum is met, the gifts will be used to establish a quasi-endowment.
marketingContent: To support outstanding A&S student scholarships at CU Boulder. Once the $25,000 minimum is met, the gifts will be used to establish a quasi-endowment.
